Hero.description: Building scalable, reliable, and impactful digital products across web, mobile, and backend platforms.

About.title: About Me
About.p1: I build scalable, high-performance digital products with a strong focus on <highlight>Next.js, Java, and Microservices</highlight>. My work blends clean architecture, thoughtful UI, and production-ready engineering to deliver systems that perform reliably at scale.
About.p2: I design and implement solutions across <highlight>web, Node.js backends, Android, and iOS platforms</highlight>, ensuring consistent performance, and user experience on every device.
About.p3: I thrive on simplifying complex problems, optimizing performance, and creating maintainable systems. My goal is to deliver products that are not just functional, but elegant, reliable, and impactful.

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.subtitle: My professional journey in software development.

description: Contributed to a comparison tool that improved AI content review efficiency.
Optimized performance via Redis Caching, reducing response time by 55% and backend load by 30%.
Refactored API endpoints, reducing system load and backend stress resulting speedy performance.
Collaborated to identify issues, and offer actionable feedback, enabling better decision making.
Developed interactive user interface using React, ensuring seamless and modern user experience.
Refactored redundant CSS into a fully responsive design, ensuring 100% cross device compatibility.
Implemented WCAG accessibility standards, enhancing the platform for user with disabilities.
Collaborated in an Agile team to deliver high-quality components through rigorous peer reviews.

project1.title: Project Alpha
project1.fullDescription: Project Alpha leverages advanced machine learning algorithms to provide real-time insights into business performance. It features a scalable architecture designed to handle petabytes of data with ease. The user interface is intuitive, allowing non-technical users to build complex queries.

project2.title: Project Beta
project2.fullDescription: Project Beta is a high-performance e-commerce solution built on a microservices application. It ensures high availability and fault tolerance. Key features include a recommendation engine, seamless payment integration, and a robust inventory management system.

project3.title: Project Gamma
project3.fullDescription: Project Gamma connects developers worldwide. It allows users to showcase their portfolios, collaborate on open-source projects, and find job opportunities. The platform supports code snippets, real-time messaging, and community forums.

project4.title: Project Delta
project4.fullDescription: Project Delta enables real-time tracking and management of large vehicle fleets. Utilizing IoT sensors, it monitors vehicle health, driver behavior, and fuel consumption. The system provides actionable alerts and detailed reporting.

Contact.title: Get in Touch
Contact.subtitle: Open to roles where I can deliver impactful digital products — let’s connect!
